{{Wired embedded system |brand=Synology |model=USB Station |revision=2 |upc=4711174720804 |asin=B00466VR4C |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf_model=SUS204 |manuf_rev=1.3 |price=150 |est_release_date=10/2010 |pcb_id=08-04ADM0113 |type=NAS |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel (EIAJ-02) |pwr_barrel_outer=4.0 |pwr_barrel_inner=1.7 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6180 |cpu1_cspeed=800 |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L8006E |fla2=128 |fla2_brand=Samsung |fla2_model=K9F1G08U0D-SCB0 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Elpida |ram1_model=E1116AEBG-8E-F |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1116R |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Enhanced USB2.0 Flash Drive Controller;AFA Technologies;UT165-L48;;1;,,, 4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1;,,, 30V 2A Step-Down Switching Regulator;Semtech;SC4525;;1;,,, 1.5/2.5A Dual Synchronous Step-Down Converter;TI;TPS54291;;1; |flags=RTC w/ battery |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell (v3.4.27); |stock_os=Linux;2.6.32.12;DSM 3.2; |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=admin |oui_eth=00:11:32 }} {{TagLine|NAS Server for Home and Small Workgroup}} :[https://www.synology.com/en-global/support/download/USB%20Station%202 Support page]
"P/N:08-04ADM0113", "Model:SUS204" and "Ver:V1.3" are silkscreened on the board.
{{See also|Synology DiskStation Devices|List of NAS Devices}}
===Reviews=== *[https://www.theregister.com/2011/01/14/review_synology_usb_station_2/ ''Synology USB Station 2'' on '''The Register'''] (Jan. 2011) *[https://www.cnet.com/reviews/synology-usb-station-2-review/ ''Synology USB Station 2 review'' on '''CNet'''] (Nov. 2010) *[https://bit-tech.net/reviews/tech/storage/synology-usb-station-2-review/1/ ''Synology USB Station 2 Review'' on '''bit-tech'''] (Jan. 2011)
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6180 @800MHz (''Kirkwood'' ARM v5) *Memory: 128MB (SDRAM) DDR2 *Storage: 1MB SPI NOR Flash, 128MB NAND Flash *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 5V/2A via EIAJ-02 barrel
==Images== <gallery> File:Synology USB Station 2 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Synology USB Station 2 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
